title: 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, in brick build. heat/hot water and 2 pkg included.
posting_body: Spacious 2 bedroom unit with breakfast bar and living room
with glass doors to a private patio.
Hardwood floors, 2 bathrooms ceiling fans, wall a/c and
Walk 2 minutes to bus to Longwood Medical, Boston,
the Orange line, shops, restaurants, etc.
Good credit and monthly income needed approx.
There is a real estate fee of $2,500.
Leave me your email address for photos.
Please reference: 2 Bedroom West Roxbury in your text or message Thank you
